text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t != 0 ) { call ( ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; } call ( ) { long long int a [ 1000009 ] , c = 0 , n , i , j ; scanf ( "%lld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n + 1 ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; i = 1 ; while ( i < n + 1 ) { j = 0 ; while ( j < n - i ) { if ( a [ i + j ] <= a [ i + j + 1 ] ) j ++ ; else break ; } c += ( j + 1 ) * ( j + 2 ) / 2 ; i = i + j + 1 ; } printf ( "%lld\n" , c ) ; }
